auipc x1,1048575
#x1 = 1048575
sw x1,0(x0)
lw x2,0(x0)
#x2 = 1048575 = 111111111111 11111111111111111111
lh x3,0(x0)
#x3 = 61440 = 1111111111111111 1111000000000000
lb x4,0(x0)
#x4 = 0
lhu x5,0(x0)
#x5 = 61440 = 0000000000000000 1111000000000000
sh x1, 4(x0)
#mem[5] + mem[4] = 61440
sb x1, 8(x0)
# mem[8] = 0
ecall
